cards.title: Google Launches Gemini Enterprise: A New Automation Engine for Workspaces
cards.tagline: Gemini Enterprise: Automate project workflows, bridge data silos, and boost PMO value.
tldr: Addresses the PMO pain point of siloed data hindering project insights by creating an AI-driven workspace that connects disparate datasets for improved decision-making and reporting.
Features Auto Mode, intelligently selecting optimal AI models for tasks, and Agent Builder, which enables the creation of automated workflows leveraging internal connectors within organizations.
Begin by identifying critical data silos within PMO processes and then explore Agent Builder to create workflows that bridge these islands, automating data flow, analysis, and insights generation.
Automated report generation, proactive risk identification using cross-referenced data, and streamlined stakeholder communication through AI-driven updates are key use cases within a PMO context.

cards.title: DXC Launches Assure Smart Apps to Accelerate AI-Driven Innovation in the Insurance Industry
cards.tagline: AI-powered insurance apps modernize operations and boost decision-making for PMOs
tldr: Solves PMO challenges by streamlining insurance operations, enhancing collaboration, and improving decision-making processes through smart automation, ultimately driving efficiency and reducing operational costs.

Features include AI-powered workflows, intelligent automation, natural language processing, and modular design, enabling insurers to modernize legacy systems and leverage cloud capabilities for scalability.
Assess current PMO processes, identify areas for AI integration, explore DXC Assure Smart Apps, and deploy targeted modules to enhance specific operational workflows for immediate improvements.
Use cases encompass claims processing optimization, risk assessment automation, policy management enhancement, and enhanced customer interaction strategies, all designed to improve PMO performance.

cards.title: OpenAI Adds Full MCP Support to ChatGPT Developer Mode
cards.tagline: Enhance project automation with ChatGPT's new MCP support.
tldr: Streamline project management by integrating ChatGPT with existing tools, reducing manual tasks and errors.
Leverage custom connectors for real-time data interactions, enabling efficient workflows and improved decision-making.
Implement MCP by accessing Developer Mode in ChatGPT, allowing for structured tool calls and safety checks.
Use cases include updating project statuses, automating reporting, and managing resources directly within ChatGPT.

cards.title: NetSuite MCP unlocks with power of Agentic AI
cards.tagline: Unlock smarter project management with Agentic AI integration.
tldr: Agentic AI addresses the complexity of project management by enabling autonomous decision-making and workflow orchestration, reducing the burden on PMO teams.
Key features include natural language processing, context interpretation, and the ability to learn and adapt, enhancing project execution and reporting.
Implement Agentic AI by integrating NetSuite's MCP connector, allowing for seamless connections to various AI platforms and custom applications.
Use cases include financial reporting, automated insights generation, and workflow management, streamlining processes and improving efficiency in PMO operations.

cards.title: 7 AI Agents That Will Replace Your Virtual Assistant in 2025
cards.tagline: Upgrade your PMO assistant: AI agents automating tasks by 2025.
tldr: Address PMO inefficiency by transitioning from reactive virtual assistants to proactive AI agents, streamlining task management and freeing up PMO resources for strategic work.
These AI agents think, plan, and act autonomously, learning from interactions, adapting to new situations, and making informed decisions without constant human intervention.
Explore available AI agent platforms, identify key PMO tasks suitable for automation, and begin piloting AI agent integration in controlled environments.
Use AI agents for automated project status updates, risk identification, resource allocation optimization, and proactive stakeholder communication, improving project delivery and efficiency.
